itemDisplayName: Deploy VM Scale Set with MsgGenRecv.jar java programme that listens for incoming requests & AutoScale
description: Deploy a VM Scale Set behind a load balancer/NAT & each VM running a simple Java  app that processes the requests. With Autoscale configured Scale Set will scale out & in as needed
summary: Deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each VM runs a MsgGenRecv.jar  programme  Auto scaling activity is triggered based on MessageCount of servicebus queue taskqueue
